attributes.action: scrap the TV licence fee for Armed forces personnel on temporary duty in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our armed forces deserve the same rights as all of the people watching tv in caravans up and down the country who are covered by their home licence.  why, if a member of the armed forces already has a licence to cover their home address, should they also be forced to pay for a second licence to cover themselves when stationed away from home
